summary: This is an internal email chain from October 2020 regarding data processing in the Relativity database for the Epstein productions. A paralegal specialist from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the SDNY is requesting that certain control numbers be checked and coded as 'identified responsive,' while a contractor notes delays due to setting up for Epstein productions.

persons.name: Thanes
persons.context: Appears to be following up on a request to run searches in the WBTW Relativity database for the Epstein productions.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.role: Paralegal Specialist, U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY
persons.context: Requests a check in the WBTW Relativity database to ensure control numbers are coded as 'identified responsive' for the Epstein productions.

persons.name: Contractor
persons.context: Mentions being delayed due to setting up for the Epstein productions and offers that the requester can run searches themselves if needed immediately.

connections.description: The Paralegal Specialist makes a data processing request to the Contractor regarding the Epstein productions in the Relativity database.
Thanes follows up with the Contractor on the status of the data processing request for the Epstein productions.

events.title: Email follow-up on Epstein data processing
events.description: Thanes follows up on a request to ensure control numbers in the WBTW Relativity database are coded as 'identified responsive' for Epstein productions.

events.title: Initial data processing request for Epstein productions
events.description: A Paralegal Specialist from the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY requests a check and update of control numbers in the WBTW Relativity database to be marked as 'identified responsive' for Epstein productions.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from October 2020 concerning data processing for the Epstein case productions.
A Paralegal Specialist from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the SDNY is actively managing the coding of documents as 'identified responsive' in the Relativity database.
A contractor mentions that setting up for the Epstein productions has caused delays in handling other requests.
The communication highlights ongoing investigative work and document management related to the Epstein case well after his death.
